mapper.select: SELECT ej.job_id, j.name, j.thumnail_img, ej.employee_id, ej.description, ej.price, ej.timestamp, u.fullname, u.profile_picture, Coalesce( Avg( orders.rate ), 5 ) as average_rate, (SELECT addresses.description FROM addresses WHERE user_id = u.user_id AND is_default = 1) as location FROM employee_job ej LEFT JOIN user u ON ej.employee_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN job j ON j.job_id = ej.job_id LEFT JOIN orders ON orders.employee_id = ej.employee_id WHERE ej.job_id = #{jobId} group by ej.employee_id

SELECT ej.job_id, j.name, j.thumnail_img, ej.employee_id, ej.description, ej.price, ej.timestamp, u.fullname, u.profile_picture, Coalesce( Avg( orders.rate ), 5 ) as average_rate, (SELECT addresses.description FROM addresses WHERE user_id = u.user_id AND is_default = 1) as location FROM employee_job ej LEFT JOIN user u ON ej.employee_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN job j ON j.job_id = ej.job_id LEFT JOIN orders ON orders.employee_id = ej.employee_id WHERE ej.employee_id = #{employeeId} group by ej.employee_id
